text: Kuma sifar waÉ—anda suke ciyar da dukiyarsu domin neman yardojin Allah, kuma da tabbatarwa daga kansu, kamar misalin lambu ne a jigawa wadda wabilin hadari ya samu, sai ta bayar da amfaninta ninki biyu To, idan wabili bai same ta ba, sai yayyafi (ya ishe ta). Kuma Allah ga abin da kuke aikatawa Mai gani ne
